reviews.text: This property is what it is...a cheap place to stay close to disney. It is outdated and in desperate need of new EVERYTHING. The staff work very hard to impress, but I could not wait to check out!
reviews.title: Not so much to celebrate here!

reviews.text: One can do much better in the Orlando area....
reviews.title: we had so much fun

reviews.text: our room was very nice on the seventh floor. the ladies who cleaned did a very nice job. we would eat breakfast sometimes in the mandalin restaurant, and the service there was great. what my family enjoyed the most was being able to hang out at the pool all day. what i did not like was that the area around the pool was very slick. Irfaan and Brian were great life guards.
reviews.title: Great plae. excellent service

reviews.text: Was at the hotel for a business trip. Staff were polite and cooperative. Room was clean and quiet. Would stay there again.
reviews.title: Unable to open a window so musty smell in the room
2nd time here and coming back again
reviews.text: The location of the hotel was perfect for visiting Disney. Unfortunately that is the only plus. Rooms are air-conditioned by a noisy machine which must be turned off if you wish to get some sleep. It is not possible to open a window so the room smells awful.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: OK rooms. We had problems with the toilet. The staff said they would fix it, but it never really worked :-(
reviews.title: Nice family hotel

reviews.text: Nice beds were you can decide how soft/hard you want your bed.
reviews.title: Great place to work out of Orland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great poolarea.
reviews.title: 1 night was enough...

reviews.text: The service outstanding from the time I walked into the hotel to the time I check out. Front desk staff was on the ball and all the staff I came across.
reviews.title: Has potential, but needs some cleaning up.

reviews.text: My room was clean great view and the amenites in the room where spot on. . The location for me working was great right off I 4 and 192.
reviews.title: we loved it and we have already booked another trip!!

reviews.text: the hotel stinks and is filthy. would not stay here and warn others about this.
reviews.title: disgusting hotel

reviews.text: Check in was fine and I was glad to see a nice lobby however when we got to our room it had a horrible smell. MOLD. I asked housekeeping to get me some airfreshner. It never came. The pool is dirty and the hot tub even worse w/ black film floating on it. The pool bar and gift shop were nice as well as the pizza shop/store. Gift shop is nice as well. Movie night sucks and that the last planned activity at 6pm EVERY night. The pool closes at 11pm so dont plan on hitting the pool after you get back to your location each night. The security staff was very RUDE in informing us of that.
reviews.title: MOLDY Smells horrible & Terrible Service and Cold food in restaurant

reviews.text: We tried breakfast at the mandollin it was COLD and bland and not worth the cost.
reviews.title: Not worth your time and money

reviews.text: I tried for over THIRTY minutes to reach the front desk on our first night. Finally I had to walk down there. Very unprofessional staff, unclean rooms and I will not go back and I go to Orlando several times a year. This hotel has some serious issues that need to be addressed. Oh and don't forget the BED BUGS or Fleas that feed on you in your rooms.
reviews.title: Great Place for family

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hidden fee of $12.50 charged besides the hotels.com rate.
reviews.title: A Really Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Our stay here was very enjoyable. The Staff was very nice and couldn't do enough to please the guests. My kids enjoyed the pool and activities thru-out the day. This is a nice family resort. The Restaurant on premises has good food and the service is quick. The shuttle service to the parks was good. Always on time and free. The Room was clean...and the housekeeping services are wonderful. They are very efficient in making up the room each day. All in all we were very pleased and would stay here again in the future.
reviews.title: We had a great time and would stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 8 days. It has everything you might need: a Deli which includes a Pizza Hut and the food is made fresh as you order it, a sports lounge, a pool bar and a sit-down restaurant.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: There is one large pool with a waterfall and slide and many activities and music for entertainment. There is one smaller, quieter (and warmer) pool, plus 2 hot tubs, one with a nice, warm waterfall for the neck and shoulders! There are movie nights in the lobby, as well.
reviews.title: Terrible housekeeping and maintenance

reviews.text: There is a $12.00 daily resort fee, which we don't usually like, but at check-in, they give you sheets of coupons for savings from all of the above eateries and bars, inculding buy-one-get-one deals. We were able to take a day or two off from visiting theme parks and just stay at the hotel. It was very relaxing.
reviews.title: Too big and hidden charges. Very un clean

reviews.text: The room was nice, and we had plenty of room for 2 people. We had a king-sized bed, and the only complaint is that we couldn't get the Sleep Number to stay in a comfortable position. That may be due to the frequent usage by hotel guests. Because it was SO HOT we frequently slept in and visitied the pool in the mid-mornings, so we did not leave the room until mid-to-late afternoon, and the housekeeping staff always got our room done, anyway. All of the staff were very nice, except for one bartender in the sports lounge, who didn'e seem to want to be there (can't remember her name, but she is blonde and speaks with an accent).
reviews.title: Ideal for Disney/Universal
